metadata.title: SHOW SEASON ANIMAL PRODUCTS 1 Showseason® Enjoymint Pet Cologne 2.5 oz For Dogs | Travel Size | Long-Lasting Odor Eliminator | Paraben-Free | Biodegradable & Non-Toxic | Made in The USA
features: A FRAGRANCE YOU AND YOUR PET WILL LOVE: Leaves your pet smelling like soft lavender, mint and a hint of green tea. This delicious scent is amazing at controlling pet odor between baths, giving the coat a fresh, clean aroma that lasts for weeks without it being overpowering to you or your pet’s keen nose.

EASY TO USE SPRAY: Say goodbye to messy oily sprays that leave residue on your pet’s coat…for good! Simply spritz lightly on coat as a finishing touch for your just-groomed pet, making sure to avoid sensitive areas, then sit back and enjoy the long-lasting scent and endless snuggles.

GENTLE AND SAFE: Having great smelling products is only part of our promise! Your pet’s safety is something we take great pride in and extra care during manufacturing; we use 100% dog-safe ingredients so your dog or even your PUPPY can enjoy the experience that only we can provide.

PROFESSIONAL GRADE QUALITY: Our cologne offers top professional quality from its creation to its packaging, granting you and your pet the opportunity to not only smell great, but to do so safely and effectively regardless of your dog’s or puppy’s age and coat type.

ETHICAL GUARANTEE: Our products are made in the USA with sustainable ingredients that are non-toxic and 100% cruelty-FREE. In order to protect your pet’s well-being and that of our planet, our packaging is made of fully recyclable and eco-friendly materials.
description: Our Enjoymint Pet Cologne will leave your pet smelling like soft lavender, mint, and a hint of green tea. It’s great at controlling pet odor between baths, giving the coat a fresh, clean aroma that lasts for weeks without overpowering. You can kiss messy oily sprays goodbye; just spritz using the easy-to-use non-aerosol spray as a finishing touch for your just-groomed pet, then sit back and enjoy the long-lasting scent and endless snuggles! Professional grade quality is all we deliver, so your pet can enjoy a great-smelling product that is safe for them and their environment.
